data.title: UEFA Champions League Winners List
data.meta_description: The current Champions League Winner is Manchester City, who won their 1st UEFA title. Real Madrid won the 2022-23 UEFA Championship League by defeating Inter with a
data.text:
The current Champions League Winner is Manchester City, who defeated Inter with a 1-0 score in the 68th Season of the UEFA Champions League (UCL). Manchester City has a history of being one of the most successful teams in UCL. The final match of the 2023 UEFA Championship held at the Atatürk Olympic Stadium in Istanbul, Turkey.

Thirty-two clubs are competing to take home the UEFA Championship trophy. Learn more about the current Champions League Winner, UCL winners' history, and the year-wise and nation-wise list of UCL winners here.

UEFA Champions League 2023 Winner is Manchester City

Established in 1955, UCL is a seasonal football championship organized by the Union of Football Associations. The championship is contested by 32 top-tier European football clubs. The championship typically begins in late June, and the final match held in late May or early June declares the Champions League Winner.

The 2022-23 UEFA Champions League winner will be considered qualified for the 2023–24 UCL group stage. The current UCL defending champions are Manchester City, with their 1st title in the Champions League.

Current Champions League Winner

Manchester City was the 2022-23 UCL Winners and is defending their title this year. They won their record-breaking 1st UCL title last year with their 1-0 win against Inter. Manchester City is one of the most successful Premier League football clubs and has won:

UEFA Champions League Winners List: Top Champions

The top champions of the UEFA Championship League are listed here. Some countries and clubs have been on top of the UCL winners listed multiple times. The most successful football club with 14 UCL titles is Real Madrid. However, there are other clubs that have won the prestigious football title many times, and the details of the same are shared here.

FAQs on UEFA Champions League Winners List

Q1. Who is the current UEFA Champions League Winner?

The UEFA Champions League Winner in 2022-2023 was Manchester City. Their 1-0 win against Inter bagged them their 1st UEFA Championship League title.

Q2. Who has won UEFA Champions League the most number of times?

Real Madrid has been the UEFA Champions League winner most times. The top-tier football club has won the Championship a record 14 times. Their recent win was the 37th Season of the UEFA Champions League held in 2021-2022.

Q3. Who won the Champions League three times in a row?

Real Madrid was the Champions League winner three times in a row. They won the championship in 2015-16, 2016-17, and 2017-18. Real Madrid is one of the most successful European football clubs, with 14 UCL titles in total.

Q4. Who has won the Champions League each year?

The UCL winners for each year are Manchester City (2022-23), Real Madrid (2021-22), Chelsea (2020-21), Bayern Munich (2019-20), Liverpool (2018-19), Real Madrid (2017-18, 2016-17, 2015-16), Barcelona (2014-15), etc.

Q5. Where can I get Champions League winners by year?

Find the Champions League winners by year shared here. The 2023 UCL winner are Manchester City also you can checl last 20 years winners and runners of UEFA Champions League Here.
